title: How to See a Password Protected PDF Using Gmail

steps.headline: Try opening the PDF.
steps.description: If you get a message that it's password protected, follow the next steps.

steps.headline: Send the password protected PDF to a Gmail account.
steps.description: You can send it from yourself to yourself, provided you pick up the attachment. If you don't already own one, open a Gmail account.

steps.headline: Look for the message containing the PDF.
Open the email message.
steps.description: Click on "Open as HTML". This is found at the base of the Gmail message. The PDF will now open without you needing the password.

tyn: PDF document protected by a password
text: Try opening the PDF. If you get a message that it's password protected, follow the next steps. Send the password protected PDF to a Gmail account. You can send it from yourself to yourself, provided you pick up the attachment. If you don't already own one, open a Gmail account. Look for the message containing the PDF.  Open the email message. Click on "Open as HTML". This is found at the base of the Gmail message. The PDF will now open without you needing the password.
sentences: If you get a message that it's password protected, follow the next steps.
Send the password protected PDF to a Gmail account.
You can send it from yourself to yourself, provided you pick up the attachment.
If you don't already own one, open a Gmail account.
Look for the message containing the PDF.
This is found at the base of the Gmail message.
The PDF will now open without you needing the password.
